venue.name: Crypto.com Arena
venue.address: 1111 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015

Rinkside.Description: Seats right next to the action for an unparalleled game experience.
Rinkside.View_Quality: Direct ice-level view, engaging and immersive experience.
Rinkside.Unique_Features: Chance for player interactions, possibility of being seen on TV.
Rinkside.Accessibility: Easy access, but limited space for personal mobility devices.
Rinkside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to the Premier Club, complimentary dining and beverages.

Club_Seats.Description: Offering a fantastic view of the game from the sides with added benefits.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views with clear line of sight to the ice.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Wider seats with more leg room, less crowded sections.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, nearby elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Access to premium lounges and in-seat wait service.

Center_Balcony.Description: Great overall view of the game from an elevated position.
Center_Balcony.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the ice, ideal for tactical analysis.
Center_Balcony.Unique_Features: Affordable pricing for a comprehensive view of the action.
Center_Balcony.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, elevators to balcony level.
Center_Balcony.Special_Perks: More budget-friendly option with a full view of the ice.

Loge_Level.Description: Just above courtside, offering close views without being on the ice.
Loge_Level.Sections: Mid Ice Sections 15-17 and 1-2; Corners Sections 13-14, 18-19, 22-23, and 3-4
Loge_Level.View_Quality: Close to the action with a slightly elevated perspective.
Loge_Level.Unique_Features: Proximity to the ice with a more accessible price point.
Loge_Level.Special_Perks: Good balance of price, view, and experience.

restaurants_bars.name: Yard House
restaurants_bars.address: 800 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
restaurants_bars.description: A high-end sports bar with a huge menu of New American fare and an extensive list of draft beers.

restaurants_bars.name: Toms Watch Bar
restaurants_bars.address: 1011 S Figueroa St B101, Los Angeles, CA 90015
restaurants_bars.description: Known for its 360Â° viewing room, Tom's offers an immersive sports viewing experience with a wide variety of drinks and classic American dishes.

restaurants_bars.name: Flemings Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar
restaurants_bars.address: 800 W Olympic Blvd Suite A135, Los Angeles, CA 90015
restaurants_bars.description: Upscale steakhouse offering prime cuts of beef, a fine wine selection, and a sophisticated dining experience.

restaurants_bars.name: The Pantry Cafe
restaurants_bars.address: 877 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90017
restaurants_bars.description: Historic diner serving hearty American breakfasts & lunches 24/7 in a cozy, retro setting.

restaurants_bars.name: Broken Spanish
restaurants_bars.address: 1050 S Flower St, Los Angeles, CA 90015
restaurants_bars.description: Contemporary restaurant offering an innovative take on traditional Mexican cuisine, with a focus on local and sustainable ingredients.

accommodations.name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
accommodations.address: 900 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
accommodations.description: Luxury hotel offering sophisticated accommodations with sweeping city views, located in the heart of the entertainment district.

accommodations.name: Hotel Figueroa
accommodations.address: 939 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015
accommodations.description: Historic hotel known for its Spanish Colonial style, offering a unique stay experience near the Crypto.com Arena.

accommodations.name: The Ritz-Carlton, Los Angeles
accommodations.address: 900 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
accommodations.description: Opulent hotel providing luxury accommodations and amenities, with panoramic views of Los Angeles and the mountains beyond.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
accommodations.address: 901 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
accommodations.description: Contemporary hotel with comfortable rooms and convenient access to Los Angeles Lakers games and downtown attractions.

tourist_attractions.name: The Grammy Museum
tourist_attractions.address: 800 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
tourist_attractions.description: An interactive, educational museum devoted to the history and winners of the Grammy Awards.

tourist_attractions.name: L.A. Live
tourist_attractions.address: 800 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
tourist_attractions.description: Vibrant entertainment complex featuring restaurants, cinemas, music venues, and nightspots, a hub for dining and entertainment.

tourist_attractions.name: Los Angeles Convention Center
tourist_attractions.address: 1201 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015
tourist_attractions.description: Major convention and exhibition facility hosting numerous trade shows, conventions, and meetings, known for its architecture and events.

tourist_attractions.name: The Broad
tourist_attractions.address: 221 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012
tourist_attractions.description: Contemporary art museum offering an innovative collection of modern art works, free admission to its permanent galleries.

tourist_attractions.name: Walt Disney Concert Hall
tourist_attractions.address: 111 S Grand Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90012
tourist_attractions.description: Iconic, state-of-the-art concert hall known for its striking architecture and as the home of the Los Angeles Philharmonic.

team_related_activities.name: Crypto.com Arena Tours
team_related_activities.address: 1111 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015
team_related_activities.description: Join the guided tours of STAPLES Center and experience the home of the Los Angeles Kings. Explore behind-the-scenes areas and learn about the storied history of the team.

team_related_activities.name: L.A. LIVE
team_related_activities.address: 800 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
team_related_activities.description: Adjacent to STAPLES Center, L.A. LIVE is a sports and entertainment district featuring restaurants, cinemas, and venues like the Grammy Museum, enriching your game day experience.

team_related_activities.name: The Rink - Holiday Ice Skating
team_related_activities.address: 800 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90015
team_related_activities.description: During the holiday season, enjoy outdoor ice skating at L.A. LIVE, a festive activity perfect for families and fans looking to experience ice under the Los Angeles skyline.

options.description: The Los Angeles Metro Rail system provides convenient access to STAPLES Center, with the Pico Station on the Blue and Expo lines located nearby.
Los Angeles' extensive bus network serves the STAPLES Center area, offering easy access from across the city.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Los Angeles Kings Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all Kings ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best selection of seats.

best_places_to_buy.name: AXS
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner for events at STAPLES Center, providing a secure platform for purchasing official tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: A reliable secondary marketplace for Kings tickets, offering a fanProtect guarantee.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Buying tickets during the mid-week can often be cheaper than weekend games. Group ticket discounts often apply for groups of 10 or more. Some games may have last-minute ticket sales closer to the game day.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from verified sources to avoid scams. If buying on the secondary market, ensure the website offers buyer guarantee. Avoid buying printed tickets from individuals on site as these can be duplicates or forgeries.
